name: TSUNAMI (bluebado)
description:
The goal is to be the first player to reach 10000 purple cells

By pressing Q, S, D or F keys, you can activate/desactivate the paint mode, and colorize cells with the chosen color

You can paint massively by keeping your mouse left button down and drawing a rectangle

During each round, you have a limited time and a limited cells number to paint  

This number grows each turn in function of the number of cells you own

At the end of the round, a tsunami of random color start from teal lakes, and flood all adjacent cells except brown mountains and others colors' painted cells

Purple cells are painted cells that had resist to 4 consecutive tsunamis, they are indestructible

You can paint purple cells to make them bicolor, they will let tsunami of this color go through

You can also unpaint or paint others players' cells, except indestructible ones...
